attributes.action: Make irwell valley reconcider on getting tenants to get rid of dogs
attributes.additional_details: A lot of people have a family dog and this is just a ridiculous new rule they want to bring in please help us stop it for a lot of people the dog is all they have we pay rent we should be allowed a pet
attributes.background: Housing association now wants everybody on sale west estate to get rid of a dog if they have one within 28 days

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the local housing association and local authority. You should take up the issue with the housing association or council.

You could contact local councillors who represent you. You can find out who your councillors are, and how to contact them, here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Your Member of Parliament may be able to take up the issue on your behalf. You can find out who you MP is here:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
